title: BUG SPLAT WAITING GAME
body: So I really find it frustrating getting bug splat in the first place. Then after you have to do the automatic fix now that is goes through that takes 5-10 minutes, you get into your game just in time for your team to early surrender. Then because you were "AFK" you get put in a 20 minute fucking wait for your next 5 games because the game doesn't load properly...............................pretty awesome.

replies.body: There may be something corrupt with your drivers, hardware, or game files that could be causing these bugsplats.  If a repair hasn't fixed this, run through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide then test it in a custom game to prevent further [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.
